messages.message: I'll start things off at Node 20. The 6-Brick and 8-Sheep are too good to pass up, and the 11-Wood gives me a nice path toward some early expansion. Good luck everyone!
I'll point my road towards the coast. That 3:1 port looks like it might be useful later on, especially if I end up with as much Brick and Sheep as I'm hoping for!
Nice choice on that 6-Brick, Alice! I think I'll take a share of that action too. Node 12 looks like a great spot to start building my empire. Good luck, Charlie!
I'll head toward the coast and that Wheat field. Node 13 seems like a good stepping stone to expand my reach. Good luck with your placement, Charlie!
